description:
The girl from Shibuya asks where http://anidb.net/ch5895 [Kyouta] is, shortly before the beginning of http://anidb.net/ch40597 [T.L.Signal]`s New Year gig.
But she`s not one of the band`s female followers: She wants to attack Kyouta, and is fended off by http://anidb.net/ch5907 [Heguri Kiriko] in an aerial battle above the concert location until http://anidb.net/ch5897 [Sakamoto Ruriko] barges in and keeps both opponents apart from each other.
name: Shibuya Gal
